note.p: Italian politician. LLB, Modena, 1853. Town councillor in Scandiano and provincial councillor in Modena and Reggio Emilia, 1863; elected to the national government in 1882, 1890, and 1892.
Paulo Campioli, 2014, ‘Giovanni Borelli e Giuseppe Basini, due liberali figli del Risorgimento’, Filippo Naldi: il sito, https://www.filipponaldi.it/Borelliebasini.html (accessed 27 March 2019)
